Name: Halloween Trouble 4
About the game: Neera, the detective, is facing an unexpected conundrum. She got an invitation to the mysterious witch forest. She eagerly accepted the magical invitation and hurried to the witch forest, her hastily packed luggage in tow. She was duly allowed in, but when she reached her accommodation-to-be, what she found was an old, ruined house. To add to her consternation, a powerful witch is crazily casting spells on anyone and everyone inside the forest, and an ancient artefact called the Time Orb has disappeared… Features ✪ Earn gold and upgrade the magic manor ✪ Get into the Halloween mood! ✪ Match 3 gameplay that is easy to play but hard to master ✪ Pipe Joining, Slider, Jigsaw, and Solitaire minigames ✪ 100 levels of fun match making ✪ Gameplay options can be changed anytime
